That's not exactly it. Two tags are equal if they have the same id. Example: "Ratatatat74 Mr Skull" has id=106603 and "Ratatatat74" has id=106624. When you click on the tag title, the next page is based on the id and when you do a search it is based on the title. (in this context consider artist a type of tag. The same logic can be apply to other things like language, genres, parodie, character...)
It appears that @fallen.demon has already recommended this one in those three big chunks of source codes that I saved but I'll still recommend 267959, it is some HEAVENLY cunny

Man this has some wack ass code eh? Invisible tags, being able to access galleries before they're fully published, this site just gets weirder the more you spend time on it. Did you know that some of the tags don't work? Because I do, the primary example I can give for this is the tag for the artist “ratatatat74 | mr.skull“ they always say the artist only has 1 work uploaded to this site, but if you manually search for “ratatatat74“ you'll see they actually have 66 works that have been uploaded to this site! And that's just one example I can remember of the top of my head, there's actually quite a few broken tags I've found, you can just go to the tag list and see some at the “#“ section

And about invisible tags, its really a bug from NH. Apparently the website (frontend) and the api is not "synchronized". The same behavior occurs with the favorite number.  A example is the gallery 118954. The api tags are: 'Piercing', 'Magical Girl', 'Group', 'Nakadashi', 'Lolicon', 'Gyaru Oh', 'Filming', 'Tiara', 'Rape', 'Blowjob', 'Gloves', 'Hair Buns', 'Forced Exposure', but if you see it missing some.

Did anyone know that is possible to access galleries that have not been published? For exemple: at this time the gallery 396020 is the last publication, but its possible to access another galleires like 396021, 396022, 396023.. (since it was uploaded, of course). I thought its was general knowledge, but some people dont know about this. Sometimes can be raised a 404 error, but its mean that there are not gallery or it was removed.

Still, there are definitely some fonts that if used to write longer comments will get your comments muted. Here's an example: you can comment "ℙ𝕠𝕥𝕒𝕥𝕠𝕖𝕤" once and all is well but copy and past that into your comment 6 times then post it and log out to have a look and your message is invisible.
Weird... it seems you can still post glitch comments like the one under this comment, no matter how long you make them they don't get muted. Good to know.

I Just learnt another nhentai secret: so basically you can post a comment in any font you want "𝕰𝖝𝖆𝖒𝖕𝖑𝖊" by simply converting your comment's font in websites that offer that service. Most people already know that but it seems some time recently nhentai changed a little and now if you write a comment longer than 2 or 3 words that's written in a weird font like my example or in any other weird font, nhentai will instantly mute the comment, meaning it will look normal to you while you're logged in but nobody else can actually see the comment unless they're on your profile looking at your recent comments. you can tell if any of your comments are muted by looking for them while logged out. You used to be able to write long comments in weird font up until recently but it seems those comments will just get muted now.

Here's another thing: if you want to make a nhentai account with a name that's already taken, say something like naruto or luffy, you can't do it (because the name is already taken) but switching some of the letters out with letters from the Slavic alphabet that look identical will enable you to do it. Here's an example, this luffy (luffy) was written in English but this one (luffу) has a Slavic letter they both look the same but to nhentai they are different and their for even if the username luffy is taken by using Slavic letters you can still have that username.

Here's something else you can normally only find out the hard way: many of the most infamous nhentai users have multiple sleeper accounts that appear to be different people that they can use to attack or play tricks on you. there are also many troll accounts here, an eazy way to spot a troll account is if it has no favorites but that is often not the case and you should rely on your own judgment. Unless your only doing it for fun never battle a troll account because that's what the person wants. even if a troll account makes you very angry say nothing because if you attack them you've given them what they want.

Here's another thing I've learned that you can't find out anywhere spamming a single comment section with heaps of comments and offending lots of people will get your account permanently made invisible your account can also be permanently made invisible if you say bad things abut A l l a h or are constantly being offensive and are reported by enough people. Reporting something once seems to do nothing but once large groups of people spam report something nhentai will usually take action within like 24 hours to a week. If your account is made invisible you'll still be able to access your favorites and read hentai but nobody can see any of your old comments and your either can't make new comments or nobody can see them.
